entities.name: ern
entities.description: The driver of the Knight Bus. He slammed on the brakes to stop the bus in front of the Leaky Cauldron.

entities.name: knight bus
entities.description: A magical bus that transported Harry and Stan from London to Diagon Alley.

entities.name: leaky cauldron
entities.description: A small and shabby-looking pub in London that served as a front for the magical entrance to Diagon Alley.

entities.name: diagon alley
entities.description: A hidden street in London where wizards and witches could buy magical supplies.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story. He was a wizard who rode on the Knight Bus with Stan.

entities.name: stan
entities.description: A friend of Harry's who also rode on the Knight Bus.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Harry's owl that was transported in a cage on the Knight Bus.

entities.name: cornelius fudge
entities.description: The Minister of Magic who appeared unexpectedly to Harry and Stan.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: A person mentioned by Stan in his conversation with Cornelius Fudge.

relationships.description: Ern was the driver of the Knight Bus.
Harry walked into the Leaky Cauldron, which was located behind the pub.
Stan rode on the Knight Bus with Harry.
Harry owned Hedwig, which was transported in a cage on the Knight Bus.
Stan mentioned Neville's name in his conversation with Cornelius Fudge.
Cornelius Fudge met Harry unexpectedly on the street.
Stan called out to Ern from the doorway of the Knight Bus.
